content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant mn and the defendant an the court awarded both parties equal shares of a tworoom apartment a barn a warehouse and two plots of land the applicant filed for divorce stating that the marriage was no longer viable due to the defendants alcohol abuse and failure to take care of the family the court decided to dissolve the marriage and ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings the defendant was also ordered to pay the applicant a total of 99101 for various fees and 132.8 EUR  for postage costs
